source.code:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import { Input, Switch, Select, SelectTrigger, SelectValue, SelectContent, SelectItem, } from '@persona-framework/ui' import { Check } from 'lucide-react' export interface EditorSettings { theme: 'dark' | 'light' | 'high-contrast' fontSize: number fontFamily: string tabSize: number insertSpaces: boolean wordWrap: boolean lineNumbers: boolean minimap: boolean breadcrumbs: boolean autoSave: boolean autoSaveDelay: number formatOnSave: boolean renderWhitespace: boolean cursorBlinking: 'blink' | 'smooth' | 'phase' | 'expand' | 'solid' cursorStyle: 'line' | 'block' | 'underline' } interface SettingsPanelProps { settings: EditorSettings onSave: (settings: EditorSettings) => void } const DEFAULT_SETTINGS: EditorSettings = { theme: 'dark', fontSize: 14, fontFamily: "'Fira Code', 'Cascadia Code', 'JetBrains Mono', Consolas, monospace", tabSize: 2, insertSpaces: true, wordWrap: true, lineNumbers: true, minimap: true, breadcrumbs: true, autoSave: false, autoSaveDelay: 1000, formatOnSave: false, renderWhitespace: false, cursorBlinking: 'blink', cursorStyle: 'line', } export function SettingsPanel({ settings: initialSettings, onSave }: SettingsPanelProps) { const [settings, setSettings] = useState(initialSettings) const [saveStatus, setSaveStatus] = useState<'idle' | 'saving' | 'saved'>('idle') const saveTimeoutRef = useRef | null>(null) const statusTimeoutRef = useRef | null>(null) // Auto-save with debounce useEffect(() => { return () => { if (saveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(saveTimeoutRef.current) if (statusTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(statusTimeoutRef.current) } }, []) const updateSetting = (key: K, value: EditorSettings[K]) => { const newSettings = { ...settings, [key]: value } setSettings(newSettings) // Show saving status immediately setSaveStatus('saving') // Clear existing timeout if (saveTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(saveTimeoutRef.current) if (statusTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(statusTimeoutRef.current) // Debounce the save (300ms delay) saveTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => { onSave(newSettings) setSaveStatus('saved') // Reset status after 2 seconds statusTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => { setSaveStatus('idle') }, 2000) }, 300) } const handleReset = () => { setSettings(DEFAULT_SETTINGS) onSave(DEFAULT_SETTINGS) setSaveStatus('saved') if (statusTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(statusTimeoutRef.current) statusTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => setSaveStatus('idle'), 2000) } return (
Settings {saveStatus === 'saving' && ( Saving... )} {saveStatus === 'saved' && ( Saved )} {saveStatus === 'idle' && ( Changes apply instantly )}
Appearance
Theme

updateSetting('fontSize', parseInt(e.target.value) || 14)} className="w-20" />
Font Family
Editor font family (comma-separated list)

updateSetting('tabSize', parseInt(e.target.value) || 2)} className="w-20" />
Insert Spaces
Insert spaces when pressing Tab
updateSetting('insertSpaces', checked)} />
Word Wrap
Wrap lines that exceed viewport width
updateSetting('wordWrap', checked)} />
Line Numbers

Breadcrumbs

Auto Save Delay

updateSetting('autoSaveDelay', parseInt(e.target.value) || 1000)} className="w-[100px]" />
)}

updateSetting('formatOnSave', checked)} />

state_fields.reasoning: useState hook 'settings' maps to actor state field
useState hook 'saveStatus' maps to actor state field
useRef 'saveTimeoutRef' becomes non-reactive state (no re-render on change)
useRef 'statusTimeoutRef' becomes non-reactive state (no re-render on change)

options.label: Message dispatch
options.description: Parent passes a message ID, child dispatches to parent

options.label: Actor reference
options.description: Parent passes a reference, child sends messages to parent actor
